title: Dan Bilzerian's Secret to Women Fighting Over HIM! #shorts
description:
Here's a clip from a podcast episode with Dr. David Buss #shorts 
Full Video 🔗: https://youtu.be/a6SXALMQPuQ

———————————————————
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men? 

Michael’s Men of Action Mentoring Program is a Master’s course dedicated to helping people elevate their social lives by becoming higher status and building elite social circles.

Click the link to learn how you can start living the high-status social life you always wanted: https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

channel_info.title: Michael Sartain
channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast 

🔥Teaching you how to build a network of desirable women and high-status men

👇 Click the "Men of Action" link below now to forge a high-status lifestyle and join the elites

transcription: {"text": "women view a man as more attractive if other women find the man attractive. So in our studies in our lab, even just putting an attractive woman standing next to a guy causes women to rate the guy as more attractive compared to him standing there alone. Part of it is that it's preselection, but also it's acute to status because status is partly determined by what we can call the attention structure. That is, the high-status males are the ones to whom the most people pay the most attention. And so when you're the organizer, when you're say of these events, you are the center of the attention structure and then surrounded by attractive women. So you have two things going for you. Dr. Buss, it's indescribable. There's a social media influencer who came on here, Dan Bilzerian, about 10 weeks ago. And I hang out with him sometimes and I watch women physically fight just to be around this guy. It's one of the craziest things I've ever seen. He said this before. It's a situation where I've experienced this. When I walk into a nightclub with two girls, nobody really wants to talk to me. When I walk in with 20 girls, everyone wants to know who I am. I find people, just random women coming up.
